content: chore: adaptations for nightly-2025-06-15 #25940 Please review this PR. At the end of the month this diff will land in 'master'.

Fairly straightforward. Most of the changes are removing no-op show commands. These changes are in f076c124d254e3396ad236f987b1920803416674 which can be reverted separately if needed once we've decided how to proceed on #25749.
Unfortunately this is failing in CI, with lake build --no-build in the post-build step. I haven't tried to diagnose further yet, this must be some fallout from our CI changes.
